properties.body:
TYRRHENIAN SEA.
ITALY.
DNC 08.
17 METER S/V, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
OVERDUE ELBA ISLAND (42-46.80N 010-16.50E)
TO SARDINIA (40-00.00N 009-00.00E).
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP
A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
EMAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
